listing.listing_description: Named after its unique architecture of winged rooflines, this new villa offers dramatic views over the St. Jean Bay and is one of our top St. Barts vacation rentals for a group of friends travelling together. You will fall in love with the unspoiled tropical island of St Barts with its intimate and relaxed atmosphere and its abundance of white sand beaches.There’s plenty of places to relax on the multi-leveled terrace. The upper level features comfy lounge chaises, exquisite ocean views and an infinity-edge pool. A separate plunge pool sits on the lower deck that also includes an open-air seating area with plush furnishings. Extra amenities include an exercise room, manicured outdoor gardens, gas barbecue and a daily maid service (except Sundays and holidays).The interior of this multi-leveled home is done in soothing neutral tones with a variety of plants and light wood furnishings that give it an overall Zen-like ambiance. Many walls also fully open up to the terrace, and the living room offers plush seating and views of the water. Whip up an island-inspired meal in the spacious gourmet kitchen that includes a wine cellar, granite countertops and large and small appliances.The villa’s four bedrooms can sleep up to eight guests—each features air conditioning, a flatscreen television, an en-suite bathroom and ocean views. As an added touch, each suite has been uniquely decorated with a different, playful color palette. Three rooms offer queen-sized beds while the remaining suite has two twin beds that can convert into a queen, as well as a walk-out to the terrace.Located within a five minute drive to the popular St. Jean beach, you’re sure to get in plenty of surf and sand. A 3.8 km drive brings you to the town of Gustavia where you’ll discover a picturesque harbor, boutique shopping and world-class restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Enjoy the wonderful views of the white sands and sparkling waters of Grace Bay at this one of a kind villa in Turks and Caicos. Here stands a contemporary and decadent beachside bijou villa that raises the concept of seamless indoor/outdoor living to a crescendo. From beach loungers to kayaks, paddleboards, pool floats and snorkeling gear, Awa offers everything you need for fun on the water. Get the beach holiday you deserve with Luxury Retreats!A volcanic rock entrance pond on one side of the main living space is balanced by an infinity edge pool on the other. These beautiful water features act in harmony with the trade winds to cool the space as a fully glazed wall disappears completely from view. Outdoor lounging is enhanced by a predominantly native landscape and through a variety of perks including sunken fireside seating, a hot tub and a deck fringed with palm trees, in-pool loungers, an outside lounge area and a beachside deck with hammocks. Ample alfresco dining and lounging spaces scatter the patches of light and shade cast by the architecture.Awa blends uber-contemporary European luxury with outstanding warmth. The interiors are effortless and elegant, creating a unique sensation at every turn. Native stonework and locally milled woodwork and cabinetry create a perfect balance of softness and comfort, while custom ceramics, marble and unique wallpaper finishes offer a striking modern note.Six crisp and pristine bedrooms accommodate up to twelve fortunate guests at Villa Awa. All of the bedrooms include en-suite bathrooms. One of the master suites features a rain shower, and the other provides an alfresco shower. All of the four suites on the second floor offer amazing ocean views. Sublime rejuvenation awaits!Your reservation at Awa includes a friendly staff with personal chef, housekeeper, butler and pool attendant. Whether it’s time for a movie night in the media room equipped with Netflix or just a casual board game between family and friends, the creators of Awa have thought ahead to ensure that guests’ every whim is satisfied with a little panache. In a country known for its exciting ripsaw music and succulent seafood, this residence represents that ever illusive piece of paradise. Soak it in!Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Pelicans Pete and Patricia welcome visitors to their home—which lies just offshore from this wood-paneled residence on 200 feet of Turks and Caicos beachfront. The fully staffed villa is perfectly tailored to its setting, with 3 levels of terraces facing the ocean views. Step out to snorkel the manmade reef where the pelicans live and walk to local spots serving up fresh seafood and live music.Get to know the pelicans, schools of fish, and the occasional stingray or turtle by taking the villa’s snorkeling equipment, kayaks, and stand-up paddleboards out for a spin. Back on the beach, start a game of beach tennis or volleyball or take a few laps of the heated swimming pool. Ask the chef to serve dinner at the alfresco dining area on the second-story deck, then head to the rooftop terrace to watch the sunset.A recent renovation made this villa a modern take on the beach house—and gave it a little European flair. Stone walls and wood paneling echo the rock-dotted coast and native trees outside. Natural tones in the great room’s living and dining areas, plus a driftwood-hewn fixture over the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen, bring the beach indoors.The villa’s Thompson Cove location means you just need to snap on a mask and swim out to the reef for great snorkeling. But it’s also easy to reach more great beaches: Smiths Cove is a 10-minute drive, and Sapodilla Bay and Grace Bay are within 10 kilometers.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Plan a special getaway for just the two of you at Villa Amalfi. Set on the white-sand shores and warm turquoise waters of Sapodilla Bay, the one-bedroom villa boasts picture-perfect views and direct beach access. Contemporary interiors clad in Carrara marble make a luxe yet minimalist frame for the postcard-worthy scenery.Everything you need to enjoy the famed Turks and Caicos sun and sand is at your fingertips at Villa Amalfi, from chaise longues perfect for sunbathing to kayaks and paddleboards. Take a swim in the bay or your own pool, rinse off in the outdoor shower and enjoy local seafood from the barbecue at the beachfront dining area. In the evening, set the mood with the Bluetooth speaker, iPad and Wi-Fi and enjoy a nightcap at the lounge area on the terrace.The villa’s sleek interiors let the beach views take center stage while creating a comfortable, luxe atmosphere. The great room, which opens to the terrace via wall-to-wall glass sliding doors, gets a bit of glamour from a marble-clad feature wall and floors. A soft gray sectional and cerulean ikat-print chairs are inviting spots to cozy up that nod to the hues of the water outside. The fully equipped kitchen has deep, dramatic mahogany cabinets and room for two at the breakfast bar.The bedroom at Villa Amalfi occupies the second floor. It’s topped by a stunning Balinese-inspired peaked wood ceiling and opens to a balcony with a lounge area overlooking the water. There’s a king bed facing the water, a marble-clad shower open on one side and a stand-alone tub that encourages hours of soaking.Though you could spend your whole stay in your paradise on Sapodilla Bay, it’s just 6 miles from Villa Amalfi to the dining and nightlife at Turtle Cove, 10.5 km to the courts at Turks and Caicos Islands Tennis Club and 15.3 km to the gorgeous sights of Princess Alexandra National Park. At the end of your trip, plan on a 7.5 km drive to Providenciales International Airport.Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

ul.li: Bedroom 1 - Master: King size bed, Ensuite bathroom with stand-alone bathtub, Television, Private balcony with outdoor furniture

listing.listing_description: This oceanfront property is great for family vacations, located in the gated community of The Lagoons in Montego Bay. Lush greenery surrounds the beachy 2-storey villa, with large windows, hardwood floors, and pops of colour found inside. Grab the snorkelling equipment and head out for a vibrant peek at underwater marine life before hopping in a kayak and paddling along the flourishing coastline. Gently rolling waves are a soothing sound to sip your morning coffee with. French doors open onto the verandah, expanding the living area and providing a shady spot to relax with a book while catching a Caribbean breeze. An infinity pool, with tanning ledge, seemingly melts into the glittering horizon. Your own in-house cook is provided, as well as a butler, gardener, and daily housekeeping. Follow a stone staircase down to the beach to find tiki torches lighting an alfresco dining table set into the sand; a picture-perfect way to savour fresh fare. The kids will never complain about boredom—a playground is steps away, stand up paddle boards, and plenty of yard space to run around in. Spend an evening at the local Hard Rock Cafe tasting American dishes with a twist while listening to live Jamaican jazz. Dramatic sunset cruises, reef snorkelling trips, and private beach party bookings are all included. Shared palm-lined tennis courts at the Lagoon Complex are steps away and your pick of golf clubs are within driving distance. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Let the green of the fairways and the blue of the pool form a vibrant backdrop to your Punta Cana holiday at Villa Spero. This expansive vacation rental has beautiful outdoor living areas facing the golf course and elegant interiors with space for ten friends or family members. Easy access to the Punta Cana Resort and Club and the beach means your stay can be as active or relaxed as you like.Villa guests have access to golf, tennis, horseback riding, windsurfing and spa treatments at the nearby Punta Cana Resort and Club, subject to availability and extra costs. The villa has its own private pool, hot tub, and al-fresco lounging and dining areas outside, and a media room, satellite TV and Wi-Fi inside.A palm-lined drive and planters set a tone of tropical elegance that continues inside this luxury property in colorful tile and colonial-inspired furniture. Pale-wood accents and slipcovered chairs add a casual, beachy feel in the living and dining rooms, and in the fully equipped kitchen, pops of bright yellow bring a little island sunshine indoors.Villa Spero has two bedrooms with king beds and living areas, and two bedrooms with two full beds each. All four bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, air conditioning, ceiling fans and TVs, and two of the bedrooms also have their own balconies.The villa is just a short drive from hot spots like Corales Beach, the La Cana golf course and La Cana Beach and Golf Club, where you can join families, couples on honeymoon and golf enthusiasts alike enjoying the balmy weather and gorgeous scenery. Don’t miss the chance to visit nearby Ojos Indigenas Ecological Park, where you can hike through an unspoiled Dominican Republic landscape and dip your toes into a dozen natural pools.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Overlooking the seventeenth hole of the stunning course at the Apes Hill Golf and Polo Club in the St. James area of Barbados, Villa Cocomaya offers spectacular ocean and fairway views in a tranquil setting spotted with tropical foliage. From the chef services and housekeeping to amenities akin to those at a boutique hotel, this private vacation rental makes a great bet for a family or a special event like a wedding. Get the holiday you deserve!The grounds at Villa Cocomaya benefit from a large covered terrace, sun deck, gazebo and infinity-edge swimming pool. Sizzle up something delicious on the barbeque before dipping in for some alfresco dining. You will also find plenty of sun loungers and sun beds. Inside, there are perks such as a coffee machine, wine fridge, ice maker, Wi-Fi, media room and sound system.Designed with luxury living in mind, the interiors of Villa Cocomaya are beautifully decorated. The kitchen is fully equipped with Miele appliances and includes convenient design and a breakfast nook. Or relax with a good book and an even better glass of wine on one of the plush couches in the living area. Large vanishing doors create seamless transitions between indoors and out.Five stylish bedrooms with en-suite bathroom accommodate up to ten guests at this non-smoking villa. The master suite features a king size bed, bidet, walk-in closet, dressing area, living area and private balcony with outdoor furniture. Two suites offer queen size beds, and the others have or two convertible king to twins. These suites also have dressing areas, lounges, walk-in closets and direct access to a balcony or terrace.When you’re not at the beach, you might head to the excellent Green Monkey and Royal Westmoreland courses located within a short drive from Villa Cocomaya. If you’re planning your trip during mid-February, be sure to check out the wonderful festival in Holetown that includes crafts, music and parades that reveal the unique culture of this iconic Caribbean island. The capital city Bridgetown also makes a great day excursion where you can take in the historical sites and visit the famous Mount Gay Rum Distillery.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: You arrive at Encore along a long, inviting drive filled with palms, exotic tropical flowers, trees and shrubs. Beautiful gardens fill the entry courtyard and completely surround the villa. The Moorish inspired soaring arched entrance showcases the glimpse of brilliant sapphire blue Caribbean Sea and sky as you enter the cool interiors. The turquoise pool, framed by palms and flamboyant, runs the length of the terrace connecting the villa with the view.Inside the villa, the expansive spaces offer multi areas for relaxing, dining and cooking. Refined travertine tile floors harmoniously flow throughout. Floor to ceiling sliding doors open to the view and the breezes. The spacious, well-equipped kitchen is one of the largest on island, providing a perfect platform to create inspired gourmet meals. Light woods, granite and travertine are accented by stainless appliances including two professional sized refrigerators. Wrap around countertops provides spacious indoor dining overlooking the chef’s preparations and the view. The double living room is divided by color; one side a blend of neutrals and the other blending white plus color. The style mixes contemporary with a touch of exotic.The outdoor spaces take full advantage of the view and the gorgeous gardens. Multiple seating areas are scattered around the terraces providing large outdoor dining and comfortable seating opportunities. A built in BBQ sits off the lower dining area. Sculpted loungers surround the heated pool. Exotic plantings are embedded in the terrace. Overhead, under the covered areas, Singapore style fans provide gentle breezes. For an enhanced view, a covered roof terrace creates a poetic perch to view the Caribbean Sea.The five equal size bedrooms connect off the terrace. Each one has an incredible view. The stylish spa style bathrooms have sea views plus outdoor showers with private seating. It’s a beautiful way to connect with tropical nature. The bedroom décor mixes interesting contemporary lines and textures with exotic touches like teak poster beds, interesting art and tranquil colors. A sixth garden view bedroom is a recent addition to the property designed and decorated with the same contemporary touches of the original five bedrooms. A nicely equipped gym, with outdoor shower and sea view are just off the great room.You are secluded, yet close to amenities. The fabulous restaurants and food purveyors in Baie Nettle are a few minutes’ drive. You are 8 minutes to the French capital of Marigot, with its shops, restaurants, markets and galleries and 10 minutes to the airport. Grand Case and Philipsburg are 30 minutes away.

listing.listing_description: With the sea stretching in front and the sky stretching overhead, the views seem infinite at Stargazer. Whether you’re sunbathing on the terrace, swimming in the infinity pool, or strolling the lush gardens, this luxurious beachfront villa puts you in touch with the natural beauty of Thompson Cove on the island of Providenciales. With six bedrooms and a fully equipped guest house, it offers privacy, comfort and quiet, too.Stargazer offers a pampering experience indoors and out. The gated property includes a cutting garden, fruit trees, a grotto and waterfall, a three-zone infinity pool, hot tub and sauna—not to mention beach access. Up your game on the tennis courts; racquets and a ball gatherer are available. If you’re not relaxing or dining on the terrace or grilling outside, enjoy the games room, pool table, home theatre, dance and Pilates studios and Wi-Fi access indoors.Not only are the villa’s rooms air-conditioned, they have breezy, European-influenced decor. The open-plan living area is covered by a whitewashed cathedral ceiling and has plenty of plump white sofas and wicker chairs, but is grounded by exotic pieces like Persian rugs and Chinese-style chests. Enjoy meals at the two dining tables or the breakfast bar. The state-of-the-art kitchen makes cooking a pleasure with high-end appliances and spacious layout.There are three bedrooms in the villa’s main house, two in the guest cottage and one in the poolside cottage. In the main house, all three bedrooms have king beds and en-suite bathrooms and two have balconies as well. In the guest cottage, the two bedrooms have a king bed and queen bed, respectively, and share a bathroom. The poolside cottage’s bedroom has a queen bed.The services of a chef, nighttime server and villa manager are included in your visit. During your stay, the villa’s staff can also arrange spa treatments and adventure activities. Though the views from Thompson Cove are mostly of sea and sky, Stargazer is very close to the heart of Providenciales, just a 5-minute drive from the airport and a 12-minute drive from the golf course.Read more about Stargazer Villa in our magazine (http://magazine.luxuryretreats.com/2015/07/stargazer-villa-turks-and-caicos/)Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: True to its name, Villa Seacliff offers spectacular views from the tip of Ocean Point on Providenciales. Enjoy a panorama stretching from tropical landscaping to the turquoise waters of Chalk Sound while relaxing on the property’s terrace or private swimming dock. Though there’s plenty of communal space, five bedroom suites give couples or families their privacy.The villa has several levels of outdoor spaces from which to enjoy the ocean views and trade winds. A deck just off the house has both sunny and shaded areas to lounge and dine, an outdoor grill and a pool. Head down the steps to the gazebo, perfect for reading or napping, and a swimming deck right on the water. In the evenings, enjoy cable television, Wi-Fi access and air-conditioned bedrooms.With their cladding of textured coral stone, the walls of Villa Seacliff almost feel like they’ve risen out of the land. The living areas are casual and comfortable, with cathedral ceilings, an open-plan layout, stone floors that match the walls’ creamy color, and breezy wicker furniture accented by tropical floral-print cushions. The fully equipped kitchen features handsome wood cabinets, stainless steel appliances and a breakfast bar.Each of the five bedrooms at Villa Seacliff has a king bed, en-suite bathroom with shower, air conditioning and a ceiling fan. There’s no need to worry about who will take which room; every room has a view of the sea. In the bedrooms, the same coral stone walls and pale floors set a calm, neutral tone, while botanical-print duvets and shams provide tropical accents. In the bathrooms, stone tile adds a colorful touch.Though you can swim at the villa, Taylor Bay Beach is just a 2-minute walk away if you’re longing for a stretch of sand. You can also reach a tennis court on foot, 3 minutes away. By car, it’s a 10-minute drive to the international airport, a 15-minute drive to the grocery store and a 20-minute drive to the golf course and downtown area.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: With its large terrace boasting panoramic views, Balinese finishes and furnishings and modern decor, this home in The Garden, is one of our Barbados vacation rentals that is not to be missed. A playground for the rich and famous, Barbados is an ideal gateway for visitors pursuing sun, fine dining and high-end shopping.The villa’s expansive covered and open terrace is flanked on either side by lush tropical gardens offering plenty of privacy. A stunning infinity-edge pool appears to blend into the sea, and offers a refreshing spot to cool down on a hot day—it also lights up at for a night swim under the stars. Located under the covered portion of the terrace, the large dining area offers a spot for alfresco meals while post-dinner plans can include watching a movie in the air-conditioned media room.Completed in 2007, the interior of this exquisite home boasts natural coral stone walls, hardwood flooring and custom-made Indonesian furnishings. The spacious living room opens up to the terrace through large sliding doors, and boasts Balinese stone carvings and luxurious wicker furnishings with white cushions. The fully equipped kitchen is located under the covered portion of the terrace and includes a barbecue grill.Offering five spacious air-conditioned bedrooms, the Tom Tom will comfortably sleep up to 10 guests. Four rooms are located on the home’s ground floor with the fifth bedroom sitting on the upper level. Two master suites boast four-poster king size beds and open up to a private tropical courtyard with breathtaking views.Holetown is located a short five-minute drive away, where you can enjoy shopping, spa services, Caribbean and international restaurants as well vibrant nightlife. Also close by is the popular Royal Westmoreland Golf Course along with many popular fine dining restaurants.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Completely renovated and refurbished, this stunning five-bedroom home is conveniently located with private access to Gibbs Beach, making it one of our must-see villas in Barbados. A playground for the rich and famous, Barbados is an ideal gateway for visitors pursuing sun, fine dining and high-end shopping, and of course its beaches are among the best in the world.Boasting an extensive terrace surrounded by lush tropical vegetation, you will have no problem finding the perfect spot to relax on a lounge chair, and if you need a little extra shade, head under one of the sun umbrellas. The in-ground pool sits in the center of the terrace and is perfect for cooling off after a little sunbathing. Enjoy an alfresco meal out in the gazebo, it’s located just off of the terrace and is furnished with a large dining table. If you’re looking to enjoy a bit of downtime indoors, the villa also boasts a large media room equipped with surround sound, a plasma television and video games.The interior of the spacious two-level villa home has been beautifully renovated, featuring coral-stone walls, marble flooring, high-end furnishings and local Caribbean artwork. The living room leads out to the terrace and offers elegant sofas and armchairs as well as tasteful home accents. Bright and modern, the fully equipped kitchen boasts custom-designed cabinets, a dining table with seating for 10 and is fully air conditioned.A maximum of 10 guests can stay in this villa’s five bedrooms; four are found in the main house while the remaining suite is located in a separate cottage. The main home’s bedrooms are located on the upper level and three include private balconies with pool, garden and sea views. All bedrooms offer a private en-suite bathroom and air conditioning.Just steps away, the white sands of Gibbs Beach can be accessed from a private gate on the property. It’s a perfect spot to while away a day relaxing on one of the beach area’s comfy lounge chairs watching the waves.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Please inquire with us for holiday rates.Nestled along Reeds Bay in the West Coast, this classy, five-bedroom home sits on manicured grounds complete with swaying Royal palm trees—it’s one of our top Barbados vacation rentals. Known as “Little England,” the island of Barbados combines British charm and Caribbean flair and is a popular gateway for visitors looking for sun, tranquil waters and vibrant nightlife.There are enough amenities on this estate that you’ll feel like you’re on a private resort. Unwind on one of the lounge chairs on the sun deck, and if you need to cool down, go for a refreshing swim in the pool. The home’s multi-level terraces also offer respite from the sun; on the lower level you’ll find a casual outdoor living and dining area. Kids and the young at heart will appreciate the games room that boasts both a pool table and foosball; this room also doubles as a well-equipped exercise room.Inside this coral-stone villa are marble floors and high-end furnishings. The formal living room is done in pleasing, neutral tones with elegant furniture and home decor. You won’t need to worry about cooking—your stay includes the services of a chef. Enjoy dinners either in the interior dining room, or head to the gazebo for an alfresco meal under a unique chandelier. Other on-site staff includes a butler, two maids and a night guard.This villa’s five bedrooms can accommodate up to 10 guests. Each suite is similar in size and features, making it a perfect getaway for a group of friends. All rooms offer air conditioning, a private en-suite bathroom, satellite television, separate dressing room, a walk-in power shower and a king size bed. Four of the rooms are located upstairs, and include private balconies overlooking the sea.Whether you feel like sunbathing or swimming, the beach is only steps away from Moon Reach! The shops and restaurants of Speightstown and Holetown are also near the villa.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: The amenities of a premier resort meet the luxury of a private villa at Beach Enclave Oceanview Villa 8 - 5 Bedroom. Part of the exclusive Beach Enclave community, a ten-acre haven on Babalua Beach, this vacation rental gives you access to a full resort staff. Its indoor-outdoor living areas overlooking the water, however, are your very own retreat to enjoy with up to ten friends or family.Your holiday at Beach Enclave includes the services of a concierge, villa manager, housekeeper/butler and recreation staff, as well as daily continental breakfast and activities such as group yoga classes. Take the provided golf cart to join the fun, or stay at the villa to lounge by the infinity pool, try out local seafood on the barbecue or sip wine at the al-fresco dining area. Other amenities range from Apple TV and Wi-Fi to a fitness room and wine fridge.Set on nearly an acre of land 65 feet above sea level, the villa boasts panoramic views over the lush surroundings to the turquoise waters of the sea. And an open-plan great room fronted by slide-away glass doors means you can enjoy those views from the living area, dining area or even the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.Each of the five bedrooms at Oceanview Villa 8 has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; most have ocean views, too. There are two bedrooms with honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as private balconies and al-fresco showers.Turks and Caicos is known for its beaches’ postcard-perfect white sand and brilliant blue water. As its name suggests, Beach Enclave makes it easy to enjoy them, with Sunset Beach just a minute’s walk from the villa, and top-rated Grace Bay Beach and Long Bay Beach a short drive away. Don’t miss a visit to Princess Alexandra National Park, a pristine marine preserve teeming with wildlife.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Snorkel off Seven Mile Beach, experience the finest spa in the Caribbean, and return to this serene, ocean-view suite at Kimpton Seafire Resort. Named for the fiery glow of the sunset off Grand Cayman's west coast, this lifestyle resort has been ranked among the region's best, with a wide array of sport, wellness, and dining offerings. The suite itself enjoys panoramic ocean views and features everything you need for a rejuvenating escape.Designed to embrace the ocean's presence, the residence features free-flowing layout with folding glass doors opening to an expansive vista. Enjoy coffee and breakfast at the table by the open wall, or spend quiet afternoons with a book in the lounge. Prepare meals in the chef-grade kitchen, select a bottle from the wine bridge, and gather for private meals around the 8-person table.Family-friendly accommodations include a master bedroom with king bed, a main guestroom with queen bed, and a third suite with a pair of twin-sized beds. All 3 rooms have ensuite bathrooms. The master suite enjoys a private, ocean-view terrace and deluxe bathroom with dual vanity, shower, and soaking tub; the main guest suite also opens to a private terrace.The first lifestyle resort on Grand Cayman Island, Kimpton Seafire offers a wonderful array of amenities and activities for guests of all ages. Choose from 2 swimming pools for your morning dip, enjoy a workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center, or refresh yourself with a yoga class. Drop the kids off at Camp Seafire before indulging in a trip to the spa. Beyond the resort, conquer the fairways of North Sound Golf Club or take the whole family to Cayman Turtle Farm, Dolphin Discovery, or Stingray City. For an unforgettable meal, the resort's Ave Restaurant is one of the island's finest. Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Situated within the prestigious Casa de Campo Resort, this luxurious five bedroom is a sportsman’s dream, with Teeth of the Dog and Dye Fore golf courses intertwining with the resort’s beautiful estate. Ten minutes away, you’ll be able to visit one of the Dominican’s most beautiful beaches, Playa Minitas. Back home, you and your guests will love Vista Chavon’s lush terrace, decorated with Caribbean greenery, mature palm trees, and two refreshing swimming pools.Combining stately Caribbean architecture with an open-air floor plan allows Vista Chavon to invite the beautiful environment of the Dominican Republic to flow freely within its luxurious walls. Extra-high ceilings and a spacious, open-concept layout enhance the breezy atmosphere, while deep wood tones and intricate stonework add an elegant warmth to the equation. In the kitchen, you’re sure to appreciate the state of the art stainless steel appliances and bright, functional working environment. Throughout the interior and exterior, you’ll find large living areas for group gatherings, as well as smaller nooks that are perfect for intimate occasions. And, each bedroom is outfitted with a king or a pair of twin sized beds, and a lavish en-suite bathroom.Vista Chavon’s terrace is the perfect setting for an unforgettable dinner party, with an outdoor kitchen, barbecue, and alfresco dining set. And, the villa’s two swimming pools, hot tub, hammocks, and furnished outdoor lounge ensure that everyone in the group has a comfortable space to make their own.The heart of Casa de Campo is Minitas Beach, located just ten minutes from Vista Chavon. There, you’ll find pristine white sand and crystal clear waters, ideal for first-time snorkelers, kayaking, and other watersports. If there’s a golf aficionado in the group, Teeth of the Dog is a must-play course that consistently ranks amongst the “Top One-Hundred Courses in the World,” according to Golf Magazine. On the resort, you’ll also be able to enjoy their many restaurants, spa and tennis facilities, and vibrant Marina community, where you can charter a fishing trip, yacht rental, or just enjoy the seaside atmosphere.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Discover one of the original—and still one of the best—resorts in the Dominican Republic at Villa Palmas 11. Part of the exclusive, now-legendary Casa de Campo property, this luxury Caribbean vacation rental is fully staffed and overlooks a private golf course near Minitas Beach. Though its seven suite-style bedrooms can accommodate the whole family, no detail is overlooked in the elegantly appointed living spaces, inside and out.Use the villa to host an intimate tropical wedding (after which the newlyweds can escape to a neighboring villa for their honeymoon) or a relaxed reunion—then share photos via the home’s Wi-Fi. Sun-seekers can claim a lounge chair by the heated pool, children can play in the water, and the grown-ups can choose a sunny or shaded lounge area for a catch-up. As the sun sets, start up one or both of the charcoal barbecues and serve the meal at the al-fresco dining area. Of course, since your stay includes the services of a cook, butler and maid, you can always leave dinner to the staff. If you’d like to play a round or see more of the resort, electric golf carts are available to rent.The gracious living rooms at Villa Palmas 11 make subtle use of color, pattern and texture for a refined modern look. In the sitting room and television lounge, the side chairs, area rugs and drapes carry the blue and white color scheme in geometric prints, while potted plants, woven chairs and tabletop sculptures add to the visual interest. The formal dining area has both organic influences and mid-century flair, thanks to the mix of a natural-fiber rug and leaf-shaped sconces with Sputnik-style chandeliers. In the fully equipped kitchen, you’ll find more of the cheery blue and white on the stools at the breakfast bar, playing off a crisp scheme of mixed gray and white counters and cabinets.The same lively color and pattern give each of the seven bedroom suites its own personality. All the bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms, so they feel just as private as hotel rooms; the master suite has a king bed, lounge area and balcony and the other six bedrooms have two queen beds and access to either the terrace or a balcony.From the setting of Villa Palmas 11 on the fourth hole of the La Romana Country Club golf course, it’s a 10-minute walk to the start of the course, barely a 2-mile drive to the Dye Fore Golf Course and a 10.5-mile drive to La Estancia Golf Course. Guests who prefer not to golf can make the 2.5-mile drive to beautiful Minitas Beach or sample the shopping and dining in La Romana, 6 miles away. If you’re on a longer holiday, take a day trip to Santo Domingo, 84 miles away. At the end of your trip, plan on a 7.5-mile drive from Casa de Campo to La Romana International Airport.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description: Find your own piece of tropical paradise in a convenient location at Aqueous. After just a 20-minute drive from the airport, you can be at this fabulous Turks and Caicos vacation rental, looking out at the ocean. Spend your holiday laying on the beach with friends and family—there’s a beautiful one within walking distance—or reserve the villa for a honeymoon-style escape to the Caribbean.This luxury property opens to a sunny terrace with a swimming pool and a row of loungers, plus a shaded area with al-fresco living and dining areas and a barbecue. Serve up dinner hot off the grill, then relax inside by the smart TV, Sonos sound system and Wi-Fi. For your comfort and convenience, the villa has air conditioning, a security system and laundry facilities.Slide open the glass walls from the terrace to step into the L-shaped great room. This open-concept space features an inviting sitting area with a plump sectional, a dining table that seats eight and a fully equipped kitchen with a breakfast bar. The room is bright and breezy, thanks to both the glass walls and a double-height section of ceiling.Each of the three bedrooms at Aqueous has a king bed, a private en-suite bedroom, a smart TV, a Sonos sound system and, for the warmest tropical nights, air conditioning. Neutral tones and large windows make the bedrooms just as airy as the great room.With the nearest beach just a 4-minute walk from the villa, it’s easy to pop over for a swim and return for coffee or a snack. The property’s location in the exclusive Sunset Beach Villas enclave also puts you a 5-minute drive or less from top-rated Grace Bay Beach, the restaurants and shops along Grace Bay, Provo Golf Club, Blue Haven Marina and the Leeward Settlement Market.Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
